context.task_title: Review and verify session T73QD changes before new work

data.instructions:
VERIFICATION HANDOFF - Session T73QD Changes

This session fixed critical bugs and created infrastructure. Before proceeding with new work:

1. RUN VERIFICATION CHECKLIST:
   python3 -m pytest tests/ -x --tb=short -q
   python3 scripts/got_utils.py validate | grep -i orphan
   python3 scripts/got_utils.py sprint list | grep "S-000"
   python3 scripts/got_utils.py handoff list --status initiated

2. EXPECTED RESULTS:
   - 8864+ tests passing
   - Orphan rate: ~8.3% (7 decision orphans)
   - S-000 "Backlog" sprint exists with 16 tasks
   - This handoff should be the only pending one

3. KEY CHANGES TO UNDERSTAND:
   - Orphan counting fixed in cortical/got/cli/query.py (set difference)
   - Backlog sprint S-000 created for unassigned tasks
   - 16 orphan tasks linked to backlog

4. READ KNOWLEDGE TRANSFER:
   samples/memories/2025-12-24-session-knowledge-transfer-T73QD.md

5. AFTER VERIFICATION:
   Accept this handoff, complete the task, then proceed with new work.
   New tasks should auto-link to current sprint.
